Author: fabscarbs
Text: BOY do I feel this... I’m thrilled by the weight loss but at the same time I really dont want anyone to notice/think that I actually have an eating disorder. Always blame it on the healtier and more active lifestyle :)

Author: heylu
Text: oh man i can relate. and people keep asking me how i do it... my cousin asked me what i foods i would abstain from (like carbs or fats) and in my mind i was like „kinda.... everything?!“ but lied and said i‘d work out and do HIIT at home 3 times a week. i don‘t even know what HIIT stands for.
